original_text: Smoke pours out from its nose, like reeds that burn under a pot. Smoke pours out from its nose, like reeds that burn under a pot. Smoke pours out from its nose,
korean_text: 그것의 콧구멍에서는 연기가 나오니 마치 갈대를 태울 때에 솥이 끓는 것과 같구나

sentences.original_text: Smoke pours out from its nose
like reeds that burn under a pot
